dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 197 IH: Food Assistance to Improve Reintegration Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Lee of California introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Personal Responsibility and Work Opportunity Reconciliation Act of 1996 to repeal the denial of food stamp eligibility of ex-offenders.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Food Assistance to Improve Reintegration Act of 2013.
Section 115 of the Personal Responsibility and Work Opportunity Reconciliation Act of 1996 (21 U.S.C. 862a) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subsection (b) by striking paragraph (2); and
